title: Storage deal playground
subtitle: This page allows the sending of dummy proposals to the pricing engine based on the current CIDgravity configuration.

loading.title: Awaiting result…
loading.description: The proposal is being processed, this page will update automatically…

error.title: Bad request
error.reason: An error occurred during deal processing, please retry in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.

validation.isFromAddressNotSupported: The "from" field should be a valid Filecoin address
validation.isDurationOutsideLimits: Duration must be between 180 and 548 days.
validation.isProposalPieceSizeUnderLimit: Deal size must be larger than 256B.
validation.isTestFailed: An error occurred, please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.

error.isFromAddressNotSupported: The "from" field must be a valid Filecoin address.

error.onLoadSpecificProposal: An error occurred when loading the storage proposal, please retry in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
